segments.text: What did you exactly do there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was responsible for helping patients restore their organic functions , training them in speech and organism , carrying our massage and physiotherapy , taking care of patients ' nutrition and diet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think are the qualifications for being a doctor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are sense of post , mentality quality , first aid ability , emergency adjustment , and law consciousness .
segments.speaker: S2
